# Engraved Circle of Protection (Chaos) (WondArch)
## Overview
**Engraved Circle of Protection (chaos):** This addition is identical to an *engraved circle of protection (evil)*, except that it provides protection from chaotic creatures.

*Caster Level:* 5th; Prerequisites: [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Magic Circle Against Chaos (Spell)|magic circle against chaos]]**; Market Price:* 7,500 gp.

**Source:** Stronghold Builders Guidebook (WotC), pg. 75
